flow.descriptionCdata:
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.07a176d2-c99b-49f9-aceb-9f572a604b43.prompt=Component Display Name 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.105bdb04-0434-4124-b313-c38674a15789.prompt=Approver Name 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.106ab8fe-90b0-4987-84be-728cebd44ff2.prompt=Organization 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.160511f5-09ef-43c4-b98c-c82c70e31d36.prompt=Component ID 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.389c6a28-ca6b-41b1-8a62-37ad47f0a09e.description=Service to perform an HTTP PUT via the Java HTTP Client 
Inputs\:
url - the url to PUT from.
username - The username to use for basic authentication to the url
password - The password to use for basic authentication to the url
timeout - a timeout after which the connection should be terminated, or 0 for no timeout.
useCookies - Enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. Valid options are\: true/false
trustAllRoots - enables weak security over SSL. A SSH certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it. Valid options are\: true/false
proxy - a proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - a port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - a username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - a password to use when connecting to the proxy.
keystore - the path to the keystore to use for SSL Client Certificates
keystorePassword - the password for the keystore
encodeURL - perform URL encoding.
file - The file to put on the specified url.
userAgent - if the HTTP header USER_AGENT needs to be overridden, pass in the value here

Responses\:
success - The PUT command completed
failure - The PUT operation failed.

Result\:
The operation's return code.

ExtraResults\: 
resultText - the raw result of the operation
document - The Complete document returned by the PUT operation
pageLoadTimeInMS - The number of milliseconds it took the page to load.
responseTimeInMS - The number of milliseconds it took before the server responded.
URL - the url to PUT from
sessionId - the session ID of the connection to the host
exception - if an error occurred, the message of this error
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.38aa5428-a607-40e2-ad32-199dc100e7b6.prompt=Approval Id 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.3a9f3096-99bc-41f5-8ccc-42f1741bac08.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.608de336-f177-45df-992d-ecab9416c5d1.description=
This is an operation that does nothing. It can be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs and filtering them on the results tab.

Inputs\:
field1 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field2 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field3 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
field4 - optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Responses\:
success - this operation never fails.
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.a09a73c8-4131-433b-8899-02343e071ca2.prompt=Approval Result 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.a8060c86-9912-49fa-b265-ba2d979c895b.prompt=Catalog Id 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.description=
This workflow updates external approval status which is executed by Service Manager client.

Inputs-
componentId – Service component id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
displayName – Display name of the service component to be added
catologId - Catlog Id
approvalId - Approval Id	
approverName - Name of approver
approvalResult - Approval status. Either APPROVED or REJECTED
organization - Organization
reason - Reason for denying ticket request.
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
document  – returned XML document from API
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.e35e62cc-d8d6-400b-8576-889460720785.prompt=User Identifier 1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.f728bc32-d75f-4fe4-a30f-f0eb4134ea38.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
1fc6fca9-4fe2-437e-a30b-b7e33039137c.f7b2ea41-b672-4a29-813b-a4a8d92c7781.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
flow.name: Update Approval Status
